column2: Famous worldwide as the "King of the Hundred Beasts" and generally the most powerful animal
They are highly intelligent and prefer to be clean  They have a habit of defecating in one specific place
column3: away from their feeding and sleeping areas.

column2: They are kept all over the world as typical pets along with dogs.
The neck is long and head ossification is more pronounced in males whose skulls can weigh up to three times as much as females.
Characterized by a long nose and large ears It has a short neck and cannot put its mouth to the ground while standing.
A small beast covered entirely with soft body hair.
They have well-developed hooves and can run on hard soil.
